data.title: Balanced Brackets and reversed words
data.statement:
Check for Balanced Brackets/parenthesis in an expression (well-formedness).

In this problem, a word beginning with _ (underscore) is "brackets open." Same word but reversed and with an underscore at the end is "brackets close".
Underscore will not be used anywhere else.

Example: _brackets x + 1 stekcarb_ * y + _parenthesis 7 * 5 sisehtnerap_
Brackets here are balanced.

The math should not be checked, only if the delimiters are balanced.

testCases.title: Test 2
testCases.testIn: _Brackets a + b * _Brackets 2 - c stekcarB_ - 2 + a stekcarB_ * 2

testCases.title: Validator 2
testCases.testIn: _Parenthesis a + b * _Parenthesis 2 - c sisehtneraP_ - 2 + a sisehtneraP_ * 2

testCases.title: Test 6
testCases.testIn: _Brackets _Parenthesis sisehtneraP_ stekcarB_ _Braces secarB_ _Braces _Brackets _Parenthesis sisehtneraP_ _Parenthesis sisehtneraP_ stekcarB_ _Parenthesis sisehtneraP_ secarB_

testCases.title: Validator 6
testCases.testIn: _BRACKETS _PARENTHESIS SISEHTNERAP_ STEKCARB_ _BRACES SECARB_ _BRACES _BRACKETS _PARENTHESIS SISEHTNERAP_ _PARENTHESIS SISEHTNERAP_ STEKCARB_ _PARENTHESIS SISEHTNERAP_ SECARB_

data.constraints:
2 <= [[line]] <<length>> <= 400
-[[line]] can contain characters, mathematical symbols, underscore, spaces, numbers and lowercase and uppercase letters.
-A delimiter can contain lowercase, uppercase letters and underscore at the beginning and end.
-Only delimiters will contain an underscore and all of them are guaranteed to contain only one underscore.
-There will ALWAYS be spacing between delimiters and mathematical symbols and among other delimiters.
data.inputDescription: One single [[line]] with delimiters and mixed math.
data.outputDescription: If the [[line]] delimiters are balanced, print <<Balanced>>, else print <<Not Balanced>>

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Check for Balanced Brackets/parenthesis in an expression (well-formedness).

In this problem, a word beginning with _ (underscore) is "brackets open." Same word but reversed and with an underscore at the end is "brackets close".
Underscore will not be used anywhere else.

Example: _brackets x + 1 stekcarb_ * y + _parenthesis 7 * 5 sisehtnerap_
Brackets here are balanced.

The math should not be checked, only if the delimiters are balanced.
Input
One single line with delimiters and mixed math.
Output
If the line delimiters are balanced, print Balanced, else print Not Balanced
Constraints
2 <= line length <= 400
-line can contain characters, mathematical symbols, underscore, spaces, numbers and lowercase and uppercase letters.
-A delimiter can contain lowercase, uppercase letters and underscore at the beginning and end.
-Only delimiters will contain an underscore and all of them are guaranteed to contain only one underscore.
-There will ALWAYS be spacing between delimiters and mathematical symbols and among other delimiters.
Example
Input
a + _Brackets b * c stekcarB_ - 2 - a
Output
Balanced
